output: I'm sorry to hear that you're feeling sleepy. Can you tell me more about this? For example, do you feel sleepy all the time or only at certain times of the day?

To save the summary to your record, which will be seen by your doctor, you need to text me CONFIRM in capital letters. You can text me CONFIRM at any moment while I am asking you questions about your symptom. To cancel and dismiss the conversation text me with CANCEL.

current summary:  The patient reports feeling sleepy all the time.
